alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henderson, northern Hardin and southern Decatur Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Sardis, or 14 miles north of Savannah, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sardis, Olive Hill, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Saltillo, Thurman, Lick Skillet, Right, Sibley, Haney, Hinkle, Bath Springs, Five Forks, Pleasant Grove, Red Walnut, Swift, Dunbar, Olivehill, Taylors Crossing and Bucktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
